mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE aid = #{aid} AND orderstatus = 'y'
mapper.select: SELECT c.id ,c.aid ,c.pid ,c.qty ,c.orderstatus ,c.startdate ,c.enddate ,c.days ,p.price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.pid = p.id WHERE c.aid =#{aid} AND c.orderstatus='y'

SELECT c.id ,c.aid ,c.pid ,c.qty ,c.startdate ,c.enddate ,c.days ,c.orderstatus ,p.price AS price ,p.title AS title ,(price*c.qty) money FROM cart c JOIN account a ON c.aid = a.id JOIN product p ON c.pid = p.id WHERE c.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT c.id ,c.aid ,c.pid ,c.qty ,c.startdate ,c.enddate ,c.days ,c.orderstatus ,a.email AS email ,p.price AS price ,p.title AS title ,(price*c.qty) money ,i.name ,i.path ,i.url FROM cart c JOIN account a ON c.aid = a.id JOIN product p ON c.pid = p.id JOIN product_img i ON p.id = i.pid WHERE c.aid = #{aid} AND orderstatus = 'n' ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT nvl(sum(p.price*c.qty),0) FROM cart c JOIN product p on c.pid = p.id WHERE c.aid = #{aid} AND c.orderstatus ='n' ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT * FROM( SELECT c.startdate FROM cart c WHERE c.aid =#{aid} AND c.orderstatus='y' ORDER BY c.startdate ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM( SELECT c.enddate FROM cart c WHERE c.aid =#{aid} AND c.orderstatus='y' ORDER BY c.enddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
